title: A History of Modern Germany 1800 to the Present, 2 edition.pdf
description:
A History of Modern Germany: 1800 to the Present, 2 edition by Martin Kitchen
English | 2011 | ISBN: 047065581X | 496 pages | PDF | 8 MB

Featuring revised and extended coverage, the second edition of A History of Modern Germany offers an accessible and engagingly written account of German history from 1800 to the present.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Examines Germany's social, political, and economic history
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Covers the unification of Germany, the German Empire, the Weimar Republic, the Third Reich, post-war division, the collapse of Communism, and developments since re-unification
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Addresses regional history rather than focusing on the dominant role of Prussia
